page.title: 03OUR DIPTFORD CHURCH
page.content: The{ Church}at Diptford, now 789 years old is the centre of the community. Services are held every Sunday and are led by the Vicar, who spends most of his time visiting the sick and looking after peoples Spiritual needs. A written record is kept of all births, deaths and marriages. In the parish the {records} are kept in thre parish chest. For small children who find church difficult to understynd their is a {Sunday} School. Sunday School last for an hour. We often sing a chorus and hymn after that we have leaflets from the Bible group. After that we get in a circle for the end of the service.
